input.description: Alll specific configuration from the module.

Input event data based on common event model like:
<event> <metaData> <eventModelVersion>1.1.00</eventModelVersion> <eventClass>PATROL_EV</eventClass> <reportTime>1520007159</reportTime> <reportTimeEpoch>0</reportTimeEpoch> <notes>testing</notes> Down</situationSubCategory> <application>BAO-REPO</application> <severity>CRITICAL</severity> <situationTimeEpoch>0</situationTimeEpoch> <messageSummary>TESTEVENT02</messageSummary> </situationData> xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>cell-name</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Admin</value> </nameValue> xsi:type="xs:string">INC00000111112</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>pem-alert-type</name> <value Change xml created in post remediation action.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//drop-event) and //*[name() = 'drop-event']/text() = 'true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Event Orchestration Process Completed With Status: Event Dropped.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//continue-processing/text() = 'false' or //status/text() = 'failure'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Event Orchestration Process Aborted Due To Errors.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//remediation-enabled/text() = 'true' or //remediation-enabled/text() = 'bypassed' and //status/text() = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Event Orchestration Process Paused. Remediation Will Begin Post Change Approval.</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="concat('Event Orchestration Process Completed With Status: ', //status/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' = 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test=". = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${status}' != 'success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="rootName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="flags"> <xsl:element name="{$rootName}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="status"> <status>${status}</status> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="continue-processing"> <continue-processing>${continue processing}</continue-processing> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: A framework workflow to support any post-remediation actions like ITSM or event updates, etc.
